descriptionHtml:
English is not my native language so i will try to explain as i can.

Description:

This is my first mod made for Skyrim (i do not count cheats like Bards Fix).I got almost all mods from this website that i wanted but i did not found good menu music replacement that will satisfy my tastes.As you can see there are many music mods such as metal versions of main theme etc.I think Gothic 4 theme is good choice for Skyrim.
author: EvilPhoenix
